attributes.action: cap the Council Tax rise in East Lindsey for 2008/09
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Council Tax in East Lindsey is going up by 11.9% this financial year - an incredible rise considering that the Government recommendation is for a maximum of 5%.

I call upon the Government to cap East Lindsey's Council Tax rise and investigate whether the relevant authorities are using their money wisely to be asking for such a massive increase.
